title: Re: [Everything doTERRA] LLV works on dialysis side effects
content:
Thanks my cute friend, it means a lot that you shared this.
Pat
On Thu, Sep 3, 2015 at 1:11 AM, msjnuga <msjnuga@gmail.com> wrote:
First and foremost, I  gotta give it up to Pat for drilling it in my head! I'm always searching this group for ways to help others & myself, and Pat's advice usually begins with "take LLV" before she offers any oil(s) regimen.
I FINALLY started taking LLV 'as directed' for 2 weeks and let me tell you that almost everything I've complained about that started when I started dialysis 8 months ago is no longer an issue ➡ low energy, aching bones, itching, high blood pressure, etc.
I too recommend taking LLV on dialysis. Thanks Pat!

--
